results.title: Violin and viola
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode no. 1 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. In this film the professional musicians show how the violin and viola are played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for them

results.title: Van Gogh (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Films du Pantheon, Gaston Diehl, Robert Hessens, Pierre Braunberger and Alain Resnais
results.brief_description: The life story of Vincent Van Gogh presented through the medium of his paintings. Mentions his early years as a preacher among miners in the Borinage, his resolution to abandon preaching in favour of painting, the period in Paris when he won the respect and admiration of artists, the flight to Province and finally his madness and eventual death. Mentions the chief influences on the development of Van Gogh’s distinctive technique. Narrated by Jim Barrett.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Films du Pantheon, Gaston Diehl, Robert Hessens, Pierre Braunberger and Alain Resnais
results.description: The life story of Vincent Van Gogh presented through the medium of his paintings. Mentions his early years as a preacher among miners in the Borinage, his resolution to abandon preaching in favour of painting, the period in Paris when he won the respect and admiration of artists, the flight to Province and finally his madness and eventual death. Mentions the chief influences on the development of Van Gogh’s distinctive technique. Narrated by Jim Barrett.
description_for_label: The life story of Vincent Van Gogh presented through the medium of his paintings. Mentions his early years as a preacher among miners in the Borinage, his resolution to abandon preaching in favour of painting, the period in Paris when he won the respect and admiration of artists, the flight to Province and finally his madness and eventual death. Mentions the chief influences on the development of Van Gogh’s distinctive technique. Narrated by Jim Barrett.

results.title: Untuned percussion
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode no. 11 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians demonstrate how these instruments are played, their range tone, and how they should be cared for.

results.title: Tuned percussion
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”
One of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians show how each instrument of the percussion group is played, demonstrate their range and tone, and show how to care for these instruments.

results.title: Trumpet and cornet
results.creator_credit: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Basic Music Techniques”.
Part of a series of films designed to assist the musician and the music lover. Professional musicians, Glenn Madden and Gary Foot, demonstrate how the trumpet and the cornet are played, their range and tone, and show how to care for these instruments.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Milton Ingerson, Malcolm Smith and South Australian Film Corporation
results.description:
